name: 3rd International Conference on Innovation in Renewable Energy and Power
content: Power and Energy Conference 2024 will take place in Vienna, Austria on the 21st-23rd of June. Donâ€™t miss out on insightful presentations, thought-provoking discussions, and dynamic networking. Voted by past participants as one of the most anticipated ePower Conferences of 2024, the 3rd International Conference on Innovation in Renewable Energy and Power will cover topics like waste recycling energy, energy markets, risk management in the energy sector, marine energy, power systems and automation, smart grids, and numerous others.
